channel.title: Changing Client IP
channel.description:
Hey everyone.
I'm using Ambitionz client (I think iClarity uses it too) and I'm wondering how do you change the IP address?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Changing Client IP
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Your Master, post:8, topic:318023”]Opps my bad. ^

item.title: Changing Client IP
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Your Master, post:5, topic:318023”][quote author=own-u link=topic=414532.msg3051502#msg3051502 date=1260121247]
Wrong section btw.

Regardless, find your gui.java and in there you should find the current IP address that your client is using now. Just change that to your IP, save it and your good to go.
[/quote]

This isn’t wrong section. It’s the right section. He asked for help, and its posted in ‘Server Help’ Look on the board before posting. Oh, and btw remove that link in your signature its not aloud advertising.[/quote]

firstly, its in the wrong section.
secondly, alot of people advertise in there sig.

Read full topic
